title: Plane mates
creator_credit: Kenneth S. Cox and Donald Crombie
brief_description: A dramatised story for children showing the wide interest in and use of aircraft in Australia. Shows aerial ambulance, radio-controlled model planes, a trip in a light plane over Sydney and finally the Qantas jets. Includes a brief history of aviation and information on what makes planes stay up.
